DataElement.preferredName: Dental Professional Practice Periodontist Occlusal Surface Treatment Referral Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no indicator related to the dental practice referral to a dentist who specializes in the prevention, diagnosis and treatment of the hard and soft tissue supporting the teeth when the case therapy for the biting surfaces of the premolar and molar teeth.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Dental Professional Practice Periodontist Occlusal Surface Treatment Referral
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the dental practice referral to a dentist who specializes in the prevention, diagnosis and treatment of the hard and soft tissue supporting the teeth when the case therapy for the biting surfaces of the premolar and molar teeth.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.:Health care professional business directed towards treatment and care of patients.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.
Health care professional business directed towards treatment and care of patients.

Property.preferredDefinition: A dentist who specializes in the prevention, diagnosis and treatment of the hard and soft tissue supporting the teeth.:The biting surfaces of the premolar and molar teeth.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.:Sending a patient from one practitioner to another for health care services.

Concepts.definition: A dentist who specializes in the prevention, diagnosis and treatment of the hard and soft tissue supporting the teeth.
The biting surfaces of the premolar and molar teeth.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.
Sending a patient from one practitioner to another for health care services.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
